website_summaries.verdict: Sporting a silicone blade and a comfortable handle, this option works very well for shower doors, mirrors, and windows.
pros: Has a smooth, flexible windshield wiper blade design
Has a rotating hook on the end so you can easily store it
Handle is soft, nonslip, and comfortable to grip
cons: Can't be used with an extension pole
Reports that the hook fails or breaks off fairly quickly
Blade is shorter than the frame, making it hard to clean into corners

customer_reviews.title: UDPATED We have hard water...
customer_reviews.text: We have hard water and needed this for wiping down the shower door. It works perfectly and leaves no streaks! Having the hook on the end is an added bonus for making it easier to hang up. 9/26 UPDATE: After only a few weeks it's no longer usable. Leaves a LOT of streaks and drops behind. We've been using it on our glass shower doors since we have hard water and want to avoid spots. I checked the edge, to see if there was any mineral build up, but found the product is breaking down. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: jp be me

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Last only 6 weeks. I will not buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but hook breaks off too soon and too easily
customer_reviews.text: Works great but breaks easily. This is the second one that I've had the hook part break off just in moving it (not dropped or pulled on) -- this one was purchased 9/16 and broke 3/17. Previous one lasted a year before the same thing happened to it (purchased 9/15, broke 9/16). It works well and was a nice size for our shower, so I might order another, but I'll look around at other options first.
customer_reviews.author: Horsepoor

customer_reviews.title: Reduced Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this squeegee to replace a 4 year old OXO squeegee that is exactly the same make/model as the squeegee being replaced. The old model worked really well. The current model works poorly.....takes multiple passes to get all of the water off. Examining the new model reveals that the squeegee edge material is much thinner than the old model. Looks like another example of a cost reduction which degrades the performance of the product. Very disappointed to see OXO do this, as generally OXO sells superior quality products.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Breaks under normal use in short time
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through two of these in under a year now, the squeegee works great but the hook piece is not strong enough eventually breaks off without any drop or damage. I always buy OXO when given the option, this is the first time I have felt the product was not up to par. When the first one broke I just assumed something odd had happened, but now with a 2nd one to having an identical problem I know that is not the case. I looked at it closely and the two little collars that hold on the hook are maybe 1/16" of an inch round.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Great at cleaning glass
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled three bathrooms and bought these to use to keep the new shower glass clean. They work very well. They glide smoothly over the glass and dry thoroughly. The hook is very convenient for hanging over the shower pipe. No more suction cup! I wish it had a longer handle. We have to reach the ceiling in our steam shower due to condensation forming there when we use the steam feature. We had to buy a second long-handled squeegee for there. It's another brand and does not clear the tile and glass nearly as well. I wish OXO made one with a longer handle!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, hangs up neatly, no squeaky noises
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver. Our brand new full glass shower door was getting all splotchy and gross after regular use. Now, I use this squeegee at the end of my shower, it takes 30 seconds, and the door is much cleaner! The gray, splotchy, film is mostly gone (I'll still need to clean the glass with glass cleaner periodically) but this is so much easier. It is lightweight, ergonomic, and the handle hangs over the shower head, and lays flatly against the wall, so you mostly don't even notice it. It doesn't make horrible screeching noises like I read about with others. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kelly in MI

customer_reviews.title: Designed to break
customer_reviews.text: Why does a squeegee need a rotating hang hook anyway? So it will break and you will have to purchase a new one. The squeegee end works really well, but the hook will break. The first one I purchased lasted less than a year. The second one lasted 1.5 years before the hook broke. I was super careful with the second one I purchased to try to extend its life, but alas it eventually broke. If you don't mind buying a new squeegee every year or so, this one will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: ziggy787

customer_reviews.title: great but the hook wears out
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it says. It has a nice grip and a hook attached so you can loop it over your shower faucet, rather than having to try to place some adhesive device on your tile that will inevitably collapse. The downer? The hook wears out. Never lasts more than a couple years before it breaks off, leaving you with a functional squeegee that you can no longer hang off of the faucet. Fortunately it's cheap enough that I just keep ordering new ones. I suppose I could try to epoxy the hook in, but at this price point I don't care that much.
customer_reviews.author: kingofsting03

customer_reviews.title: Won’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: After moderate use on glass the blade tore, making it useless. Why can’t a manufacturer just make something that will last? Look at how small the thickness of the blade is where it joins the handle.
customer_reviews.author: ETM

customer_reviews.title: A little addition to set it above the rest
customer_reviews.text: So look wiper blades are pretty standard right? Like there's a few things that you look for but they are all pretty much alike right? Not this one, it has one thing that has made the world of a difference for this owner. The attachment hook at the end, it rotates. Yup, so no longer are you confined to only storing this bad boy in your shower the only place you could hang it so it didn't get knocked down everytime you got in the shower, nope, not now. This wiper blade can go wherever you want it to because the hook rotates!
customer_reviews.author: SKendall24

customer_reviews.title: Rotating Hook Broke the First Time Dropped
customer_reviews.text: Pros: • Easy to grip handle Cons: • Too short, requiring too many strokes to remove water • Blade (rubber) too thin and inflexible • Rotating hook broke the very first time I dropped it in the shower. (I was able to super-glue it back on, but no rotation) • Angle of head is too acute (bent inward from handle) to reach corners well Not recommended. I used it for several months, never liking it. The hook was the main reason I'd bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryga

customer_reviews.title: This compared to the stainless steel oxo wiper
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the OXO Good Grips Stainless Steel Squeegee and Ive had it for a year but for our other shower we tried the OXO 13117300 Good Grips Wiper. I like the later better especially because the built-in hook works better than the suction cup holder. Both do pretty well in their main function - getting the water off of the glass doors. The stainless steel one looks better but in my opinion the ability to hang the later is more important because when not in use it does not cause the shower to look cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lam

customer_reviews.title: Blade too soft
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an OXO Good Grips Household Squeegee for 13 years. The squeegee itself is still perfectly fine. I simply got sick of the suction that's not working any more. So I bought this squeegee with a hook so I don't have to deal with the suction. Well, the hook works great. The blade, however, is too soft. It leaves streaks of water on the glass shower door. I usually like OXO products but this squeegee is underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: F. C.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works good, easy to use, soft on glass
customer_reviews.text: I had a larger stainless steel squeegee that was very good looking, but it would slip in the hand and the metal would bang on the glass, so I decided to switch to this one. It's quiet, works well, and is easy to hold and grip. Its light weight means you can get the job done faster. Also convenient is the swivel hook, which makes it easy to hang on a shower caddy. It would be perfect it it were 1 inch wider. Maybe Oxo will make it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I have used it daily for 4 years - just bought the exact product again.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product daily for 4 years and love it. - Regular use after my shower prevents soap scum and mold. - Works on glass shower, tile and fiberglass tub. I finally wore it out and just bought the exact replacement. - It is made in China, but OXO is a quality brand sold across the US. The hook on the handle is simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in MA

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I have large glass shower doors. Bought this because girlfriend's dad had one and it worked well. Also bought highest rated stainless steel 15" one here on Amazon. This one creates a tighter seal with the blade and squeegees all the water. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Everett

customer_reviews.title: Hey, it’s a squeegee. It squeegees. With a weird end.
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee does its job. The only thing I don’t really like is the weird hook thing on the end. It’s rubber and you can hook it on.....something....but it’s rubber and I do t see it being very durable. Most squeegees have a full-circle eyelet that allows you to have it on a suction cup hook or something g like that. But here it’s a J-shaped thing that bends and just doesn’t inspire confidence. If you’re looking to hang your squeegee, you might look elsewhere. If you don’t care what’s on the end of it, hey this thing seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Daveinater

customer_reviews.title: good product from a good producer but a little small
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good device but smaller than my old one that gave up after 10 years of use. It works good but since it is smaller than the old one I have to work a bit harder to get the shower dry with this one compared to old one. Well designed and ergonometrically Ok - IT DOES NOT STRETCH ! Wish it were 2" wider so as to dry more area with each swipe. Otherwise works good.
customer_reviews.author: JFW

customer_reviews.title: Low Profile, Manueverable
customer_reviews.text: Great little squeegy. I use it to help keep the kitchen counters clean. It's also the right length to get dog hair and other stuff off our hardwood stairs, and I'll probably get another one for that once my current stairs squeegy wears out. This handles like the little white Ikea squeegy with the orange/brown blade, but it's more heavy-duty and seems to be of higher quality. Very satisfied, I would definitely buy this squeegy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this squeegee for about a week, but so far I'm happy with it. The rubber blade is a lot softer than I expected, but it does a great job of cleaning and doesn't make a squeaking noise as you drag it across the marble shower walls. I love that it just hooks over the neck of the shower head. No suction cup necessary! We have another squeegee by OXO, and have used it for at least two years. It's still like new! Too bad they don't sell that one anymore, because I would have definitely bought it. Hopefully, this one will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Fayette Terlouw

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done streak free
customer_reviews.text: Our other squeegee kept leaving streaks so we ordered this one based on reviews and video. I love how it's compact and doesn't take a lot of room when hung on shower door. Love how it glides easy and doesn't "catch" or bumps while using. It's so smooth and doesn't leave a trace of water with every stroke. The price was half of what we paid for our old one but is so much better in several ways.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Mathus

customer_reviews.title: Much better that I  expected
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee replaced a rubber version that I had used for several years. This silicone squeegee is quieter, smoother, and more efficient that the one it replaced. It also hangs nicely on the shower hear pipe and is easy to store. Five star all around.
customer_reviews.author: DAC_Houston

customer_reviews.title: Oxo rocks
customer_reviews.text: Has with almost all oxo products this squeegee is great. It’s my second one. The first one I use now in a different shower. It just doesn’t wear out and it cleans exceptionally well. On glass, not a streak.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: This is the best squeegee we have found so far
customer_reviews.text: The OXO God Grips Wiper Blade Squeegee is light weight and easy to maneuver. It removes all water evenly without leaving behind any drips. the hook on the handle makes it easy to store. We have been using squeegees for 25 yrs in our shower and this is the best one we have found. We can not rate durability at this time since we have just been using the OXO for a week. We will see, since the blade is quite delicate looking which is probably why it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Jerold L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works Well No Streaks
customer_reviews.text: My worn out squeeze needed replacement, hence why I needed a new one. This one works well. I have hard water and need to wipe down my shower glass doors after every use so not to have that hard water build up on the glass. It works well on the shower glass doors and my patio doors. A smooth silicone blade that wipes down the doors perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: bradybunch

customer_reviews.title: Blade works good
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these in my home for all three showers. It functions perfect to wipe the water from the glass. I also like it because the blas is wide. It’s used after every shower and helps keep the water spots away. My oldest squeegee lasted 5 years. When they get dirty I wipe them down. The rubber blade does a good job. I like the hook to hang, plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy, and keeps the shower glass streak free!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower squeegee. Squeegee's are not that important in life, and not something I want to think about. I just want it to work well and not break. When the other one I had purchased on Amazon broke, I found this one and decided to purchase it. OXO is a brand I trust, and I've loved all products that I've gotten from them. This one is no exception. It's not as visually appealing as my other squeegee, but it gets the job done for sure. And it's quite sturdy. Since the blade/handle are not separate pieces, I think it'll last a long time. Another great OXO product!
customer_reviews.author: Malley D.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 15 months - You decide if it's worth $9.99 to you
customer_reviews.text: So we used this pretty much every day for a total of around 450 days. But we were never rough on it. It squeegeed okay, but not above average. And 15 months after we purchased it for $9.99, the handle hook inexplicably just fell right off (see photo). Wasn't even dropped. For some reason, my wife likes the OXO brand, but I've never been all that impressed with other OXO (kitchen) products we've purchased, either. Can't recommend. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well ...
customer_reviews.text: In the first place, it has no metal so dropping it won't damage our shower tile. Next the size is perfect for negotiating around handles and hinges on the shower door. Last, the hook on the end exactly fits our grab bar for storage. Its just squegee greatness for us.
customer_reviews.author: Roger March

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep in the car.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have condensation build-up on my back windshield in the morning and do not have a rear windshield wiper. This works as expected, and its size makes it easy to store in the side of my door. I use this every morning, and after eight months, the silicone still works just as well as it did on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: best shower squeegee, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: This is best shower squeegee I've ever used. Its thin supple blade gets all the moisture from my shower including the glass door, glass blocks and tile. Haven't used it anywhere else, but its a task master in the shower. Nice, comfortable handle and it has a open end hook that rotates so its pretty easy to hang an anything. (I use a suction cup with a stainless hook on it.) OXO makes great products!
customer_reviews.author: K. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Blade
customer_reviews.text: Handle is strong but the blade is flimsy. Also it isn't made well. I definitely would not buy this again and I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: accessory lover

customer_reviews.title: Does a fabulous job on shower doors and windows
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to get a second one to use on the car. I don't know about the negative reviews claiming claim this leaves streaks. In my experience it leaves the glass shower doors and windows squeaky clean, is lightweight, and seems well built. The hook on the end swivels, so you can hang adjust it easily to hang from a wire soap dish or shower tray. Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Norm De Plume

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not a super pretty style but it works better than any of the many I’ve tried. Big and flexible hook so easy to hang on anything. The blade is small and catches all the water on glass blocks, smooth wall, and tile with grout floor in the shower. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J.Glass

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CHINA JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste you money on this.... very poorly made China Junk. The swivel hook on end of handle is so poorly made ..... poor quality plastic and flimsy manufacturing very common with China!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Best squeegee ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower squeegee we've ever owned. After months and months of use it still cleans as streak-free as the first day we used it. We've purchased many different squeegees over the years, and this one has held up better than any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer since 1996

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in each of my showers and bathtub. The blade is flexible and gets the water off the tiles, which prevents mold. It’s also easy to hang. One caution— after use, wipe the blade with a towel, to prevent mold from growing on it.
customer_reviews.author: C E Bower

customer_reviews.title: Wipes clean easily and leaves no tracks
customer_reviews.text: Wiping off shower doors is sort of a pain but this squeegee really makes it easy. It wipes smooth and clean and is much easier to use than other squeegees and doesn't leave tracks on the glass. I am not sure if it is handle shape or the quality of the wiper blade - perhaps both, that makes it better than those I have had before. I will definitely purchase this one again when the blade eventually wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Maine girl

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of OXO products due to the fact that while they are generally slightly more expensive they are much better overall in whatever the product your purchasing. This squeegee fails miserably. It’s a cheaply made product which I’m embarrassed OXO even put their name on. Shame on you OXO for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jofa

customer_reviews.title: My perfect gift for friends with glass shower doors
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using one of these for over a year and it’s still perfect. The hook makes it easy to hang on the shower head. The blade scrapes the water clear off the glass doors. That’s important in Florida with hard water, I can’t miss a day or buildup begins. Best one I’ve ever owned in over forty years.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M. Schueler

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this squeegee for the shower, and it does the job well. I have had squeegees with a suction cup to attach to the tile, and this is so much better. Because the tip is soft and pliable, it can attach to the shower hose or faucet, is easy to hang, and does not fall off.
customer_reviews.author: 16 Bars

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Bought the OXO Good Grips Wiper Blade Squeegee a couple months ago to help stop the water marks on my shower. What can I say.. it does the job is meant to do! And for only $9.99.. there really is no reason to consider another more expensive one. This wiper is durable and my shower remains spotless thanks to it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor H. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for new shower!
customer_reviews.text: We had our bathroom remodeled and put glass doors in the shower. I looked for a squeegee that would hang on the shower head - this is perfect. Easy to use. I wish it covered a larger area at a time, but I am pleased that I didn't have to put a hanger in our new shower!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee is super. It is lightweight, but does the job perfectly! My old one had worn out. I’d purchased another squeegee that did not work well at all. With fingers crossed, I ordered this one and it is fantastic! I’ll get another just like it if anything happens to this one, but it looks to be very durable! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice - gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Nice squeegee. The hook on the end of the handle is perfect to hang over the shower head pipe coming out of the wall and it lays flat against the wall. Seemed a little stiff at first and left some marks on the glass, but after a few weeks no more problems....and no streaks. My new shower is gray so the color was perfect. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shower squeegee after doing a major bathroom renovation and installing a rolling glass shower door - I want to protect my investment. I've bought OXO products in the past and have always found them well-made, just as this one is. One feature that I especially appreciate is that the handle is lightweight and easy to grip, which is great for someone with manual dexterity or arthritis issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bookbean

customer_reviews.title: perfect for shower walls
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night to get rid of excess water that usually lingers in the shower on my porcelain tiled shower. It just helps reduce the amount of water that causes mold. Its easy to grip, and the hook on the handle is perfect to hang on the shower neck.
customer_reviews.author: erica smith

customer_reviews.title: Hoom missing. No reply from support.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with no hook. The packaging was not damaged. There just wasn't any hook at all. I contacted Oxo via email and received no reply. I guess I'll have to 3D print my own hook. Poor showing Oxo. I've seen better from you.
customer_reviews.author: I review my purchases

customer_reviews.title: Best squeegee ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several squeegees over the last few months and none have worked as well as this one. I use it every morning after my shower to clean the glass it it clears the water off perfectly without that "nails on the chalkboard" sound. The little hook that spins so you can hang it wherever you want is perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: JanetG

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, inflexible bar limits uses.
customer_reviews.text: Flat surfaces *only*. Bought it for sqeegeeing my car, windows, etc., after washing. Nope. Stiff bar behind squeegee edge means it misses almost any mild curve, including side windows. Curvature means you can only swipe top to bottom, not side to side. Probably good for your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shower squeegee.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 4-years ago and have used it every day since. It is very handy, easy to use, works great. I just bought a second in anticipation that the original might wear out but it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeper from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: wow does it work!
customer_reviews.text: wow does it work! my car windows condensate terribly overnight and i got tired of waiting 15min for the windows to defrost or using my hand to wipe it away. this squeegee works scary good! i have no fear that my car is getting scratched, all the water is gone in one swipe, and the longer handle makes it easy to get the entire back window. if only the blade was a little more curved it would take even fewer swipes. however i did read that this is more for flat-pane shower glass or mirrors. no complaints from me! give it a flick and all the water is gone!
customer_reviews.author: ccc_wood

customer_reviews.title: Is it weird to love a squeegee?
customer_reviews.text: Squeegees are weirdly hard to find - quality, price and functionality are all critical components. After buying multiple squeegees (from Ikea, Target, Home Depot, and OXO, I finally landed on this one. It works! Wonder why no one else has thought of this!
customer_reviews.author: MountainOwls

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected. It works ok, not great. Not sure why it has so many good reviews. OXO usually has good products, I expected better from them. I like the hook to hang from shower head, but wiper blade is just too thin. Width is adequate, but over all needs much improvement. I'd recommend getting a better product though even if you have to spend more.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Lee

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not the same as the one bought at Target
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at Target and liked it a lot. When I realized Amazon carried it, I ordered another one on Amazon. This one is not like the first one. This one is flimsy, the blade is not smooth, and the hook is very loose. I suspect that this might be a counterfeit. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and easy to use. Light but solid quality. Wipes good and clean. The hook part at the end turns and easy to adjust to wherever it needs to be hung. I wish they had all white without the gray part. But overall quality is excellent. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Bart in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long these types of products are supposed to last but our first one lasted about 6 months before it started falling apart. We use it for our floor to ceiling glass shower door. I liked it a lot and tried a few others that I didn't like as much so I ended up buying a second one. Hoping it will hold up a little longer!
customer_reviews.author: Brielle Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Beats the cheap one I had
customer_reviews.text: Had it a little while now, and not getting that curled-lip issue the cheap ones get early on. The handle hook is a nice touch for storing, as those stupid suction cups are fooling no one, anywhere. They have never not been awful. Good riddance.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great handle and hook, just ok blade
customer_reviews.text: This has the famous OXO grip and the built in hook is even more useful than I originally thought. But this is a squeegee and it could be better. The blade is a soft silicone material but is too thin to flex enough and wipe water away effectively. It does just okay.
customer_reviews.author: savindough

customer_reviews.title: Silicon blade not effective
customer_reviews.text: Usually Oxo makes great products. This however isn’t one of them. The silicon blade doesn’t work. I got a rubber bladed squeege and it works fine in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: SewCats

customer_reviews.title: Dirty lies
customer_reviews.text: The first one we had had lasted about two years until it broke. It cleans really good. The hook makes it much easier to hang on our shower which is why I bought it again...even though it lasted such a short time. The shipping wait was months. That's why I gave it only two stars. Don't list a product as in stock AND prime if it is not in stock and not prime.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sipper

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent on shower glass
customer_reviews.text: Silicone blade works great. NO streaks or spots left on shower glass. Yes, the handle construction is plastic but seems sturdy enough for the minimal time it takes to clean shower glass. I have had it for about 3 weeks and no problems with it falling apart. All the other rubber blades on the other products I have tried still left spots or streaks on the glass. Note: I don't use it on the tile/grout shower seat as I am afraid it will cut the blade. I still use one of the other rubber blade squeegees for the seat because I just want to get rid of most of the water and I'm not concerned about streaks or water spots.
customer_reviews.author: S Cook

customer_reviews.title: Only half useful
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee only works on the down swipe, in other words only good for the top half of shower glass. If it’s pushed down to clean the bottom half it bounces all over the place, rendering it useless. Have gone back to my old one 👎
customer_reviews.author: norcal

customer_reviews.title: Streak free glass
customer_reviews.text: This squeegee does a excellent on the glass doors of the shower. A nice clear glass after using this. No streaks. The blade is surprisingly small but it still does a very good job of wiping. My other squeegee leaves obvious streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rhaspun

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I tried some other squeegees, and they all left streaks, and had weak corners. This squeegee is ideal! No streaks, and the corners get right up against the walls. Would definitely buy this one again!
customer_reviews.author: emmeline

customer_reviews.title: Hook comes out
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size and hooks nicely to the shower pipe. Then one day the hook (which swivels) came out of the main body. Used some clear silicone to glue it in place and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I loved this squeegee, used it in the shower all the time - but then the little hook came off the handle and it can’t be put back on, so now I can’t hang it up. Very annoying that things just aren’t made to last anymore. I won’t buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eagleson

customer_reviews.title: Handle is long enough!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought OXO before and they make good squeegees overall, however my old one had too short of a handle and made it hard to reach the top of the glass shower door. This one is perfect and the blade is even better than my old one (which was very good). I don't care as much about the hook on the end as I just use my old wall mount holder and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: V. Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This XOX Shower Squeegee, Built Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Only used for 3 months before the swivel hook on the handle broke off. The hook will not snap back on the handle. Wish I looked at more reviews, I based my purchase on good history with XOX products... no more!
customer_reviews.author: Ybor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a newly renovated bathroom at home. I wanted to make sure to avoid getting soap scum build up on the new clear shower doors. The hook is a great idea, you can place it inside the shower and is readily available everytime. Even the husband who was at first uncooperative is now using it to clean the shower doors after every shower. Since we also have big rectangular tiles installed, i also use it on the walls to dry them off. The blade is great and the slim design is both practical and functional. It's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Tip of handle falls off almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: As others said...tip of handle falls off almost immediately. Cannot use to hang up AT ALL!! Huge design flaw...should be a one piece handle.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was not a wide as it is and I wish the rubber was a little longer but it does the job. I do like that it hangs on the shower spout so I don't have to have laying around or install a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L. Bieschke

customer_reviews.title: Hook falls off in first 60 days, after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: The hook fell off after maybe three uses. It works fine still, but I purchased it for the hook feature. It functions fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It works great, gets all the water, easily hangs. (Do be careful with the swivel hanger-hook. It looks like if treated roughly it would not last long.) For us, this replaced a standard rubber squeegee with metal frame. Needed to get rid of the metal: we were accidentally scratching the fixtures in our shower! This one has no such worries.
customer_reviews.author: MrPete

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best we have ever bought! cleans super easy and doesn't leave any water drops behind! we have purchased 2 so far.
customer_reviews.author: footballfan

customer_reviews.title: Just like windshield wipers!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it!. Acts like car wiper blades. I like the hook on the handle that swivles around so you can hang up in the shower. I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: donut girl

customer_reviews.title: would be 5 stars if the hook didn't brake.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have reported, I too had the hook come out after a bout a month of usage. Too bad, because I really like it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Great squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as our last one, but this one does a much better job of wiping away water on our glass shower. No streaks! Plus it does not leave black smudges on the edges of the tile on the floor, the last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up squeegee, thumbs down hook
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty nice, basic squeegee. Soft supple silicone blade with solid sturdy no slip handle. But the hook intended to attach to a shower shead/caddies/towel bar is not wide enough. Though the hook is flexible, it Seems like it will snap off when rotating and attaching to a shower head. If there were other colors and wider hook, I would give a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Leland CTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My favorite squeegee
customer_reviews.text: The simple fact that i can hang it in my bathroom and that hook part adjusts is great. It squeegees the water off my shower very well and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Leng

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee’s rock
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Who knew a squeegee could change your life!? I’ve been using paper towels and glass cleaner to clean mirrors and windows and then this baby arrived. No streaks, no lint.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the shower...
customer_reviews.text: Shower clean-up is easy with this handy squeegee. We also like the fact that it's easy to hang behind the shower head assembly.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, dont like that the hooks does not turn at a straight 90 degrees though
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The hook is able to rotate, but does not lock it at a 90 degree angle is offset at some weird angle. Has several positions, just not the angle where you would hang it from the pipe to the shower head, kinda weird.

customer_reviews.title: 0X0 makes good products. This product is not that good

Honestly I bought this to upgrade the ones I get at the $1 store. The ones at the dollar store are better. I love 0X0 brushes but this product is a total miss
customer_reviews.author: DON KARLO

customer_reviews.title: Basically good
customer_reviews.text: Works well at first, but after everyday use, the rubber eventually is u seated and you have to keep threading it back in.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par with OXO's usual standard.
customer_reviews.text: I expect better from OXO. The squeegee blade is so short this is useless. Can't do glass. Can't handle the smooth-sided shower. Leaves streaks and smudges no matter which cleaner I do or don't use. Go buy a different one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Analein

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This wiper was used for purposes of gently wiping down shower walls/tub after use. I found the handle not long enough and the blade not wide enough. Biggest issue was the blade literally fell off. It's not adhered to the head, rather the wiper blade comes right out and did so with very little use, after just about a week of use! Difficult to put back in the slot and won't stay in place. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeegee.
customer_reviews.text: I use this squeegee in the shower. It's easy to use and keeps the glass doors looking brand new. It's blade is nice and soft so is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Best squeegee I have ever purchased! Use it in the shower and it does a fantastic job removing the excess water. If it’s possible to love a squeegee, this product has done it for me. Great quality and reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It semi-cleans
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. It helps a little but I do believe there is better out there for this function.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: It works

customer_reviews.author: michael j moore

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up

customer_reviews.author: Sage W.

customer_reviews.text: Always use a squeegee on the shower doors- this one had pretty good reviews. NOT worth the money. It fell apart after on 3 uses
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my glass shower door and it works great. Very comfortable to hold and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: KLS

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Well. I like it. It works just fine. But it’s weird to give cleaning products a 5 star review... as far as effectiveness yes 5 stars... as far as my desire to own and use this product... -1 star.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing for a company like oxo.

customer_reviews.author: IWilliam

customer_reviews.title: Great suction, love the hook
customer_reviews.text: Perfect with the hook as we keep it on our shower head. No other product had that! Also very good suction, our shower glass is cleaner than it’s ever been!
customer_reviews.author: Amcsh

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfortable, and looks cool. The hook on the handle is nice and flexible. I like how the blade is thin and fits in small areas. I was actually impressed how well such a thin blade works. I see this lasting a long time if not forever!
customer_reviews.author: FZ-Ponce

product_meta.title: OXO 13117300 Good Grips Wiper Blade Squeegee,White/Grey
product_meta.description: When it comes to the right squeegee for your bathroom, the OXO Good Grips Wiper Blade Squeegee is the clear choice. Inspired by windshield wipers on cars, the durable, silicone wiper blade was designed with a precision edge for consistent, streak-free drying. The blade flexes as you wipe, ensuring it's at the ideal angle from top to bottom, providing a smooth, resistant-free swipe every time. The soft, comfortable handle is non-slip, even when wet. The flexible, rotating hook allows you to store the Wiper Blade Squeegee on shower heads, caddies, towel bars and more. So whether you're cleaning shower doors and walls, mirrors or windows, the Wiper Blade Squeegee is the tool for the job.
